name: stella nsong
what_you_do: Stella Nsong is the CEO of the Caregiver Relief Network and the state director of the Ohio Elder Care Planning Council, specializing in elder care consulting and education.
who_you_serve: Stella serves caregivers, families of elderly individuals, and professionals in the elder care industry.
signature_programs: The Elder Care Cliff Report column, various books on elder care, motivational lectures, and seminars.
bio: Gold Medal for practical nursing, nominations for Business Woman of the Year, Platinum Award in Care Management, Independently Published Nonfiction Book Award, Pinnacle Book Award, Amazon bestselling author, Woman of Achievement Award, featured in Soar to Success magazine.
business_focus: Stella Nsong is the CEO of the Caregiver Relief Network and the state director of the Ohio Elder Care Planning Council, specializing in elder care consulting and education.
